title: NEW CONSTRUCTION AT THE COSMOPOLITAN!
posting_body: Luxury living awaits in this state of the art new building!

The Cosmopolitan boasts 63 boutique residences in a stunning Landmark building, The majestic architecture has been artistically integrated into each exclusive residence offering open concept luxury living with opulent finishes.
A white quartz kitchen offers stainless steel Bosch appliances including in-unit laundry.
This spacious apartment has an additional half bathroom, central A/C and private outdoor space.
Additional building amenities include 24/7 Concierge, a Resident's Lounge, Fitness Room, Pet Spa, Bike Room, shared courtyard, and garage parking is available.
Heat, hot water and electricity are all included in the rent!
This apartment offers a charming courtyard view complete with a 64 SF private enclosed patio with terrific light.
Steps to the South End's trendy boutiques and restaurants, BMC, the MBTA and I-93.
Photos are of the model unit.
